title: Workshop on Utilizing Learning Design Tools Through Reflective Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Tool Proficiency and Foundational Understanding of Language Education
context.additional_context: Program for Professionals in Medical/Legal/Technical Fields to Strengthen Language Education Design Capabilities

learning_goals: Participants can analyze learning design processes using the four core elements of the ACAD Toolkit: relational, conceptual, and digital/physical tools
Participants can visualize and evaluate the (dis)connections and (in)consistencies of existing language education designs through tool-mediated reflective practice
Participants can critically reflect on the interaction between multiscale constraints (time/technology/resources) and educational value in learning design
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
